title: Edgecombe's 34 most in debut since Wilt in '59
content: Sixers rookie VJ Edgecombe lit up the Celtics with 34 points on Wednesday night, the most in an NBA debut since Wilt Chamberlain had 43 in 1959, as the Sixers won 117-116.

title: 'Banged up' KAT plays opener with Grade 2 strain
content: Knicks center Karl-Anthony Towns said he was "hurting" in Wednesday night's season-opening win over the Cavs, in which he had 19 points and 12 rebounds despite playing with a Grade 2 quad strain.

title: Vols' Vitello makes MLB history as Giants skipper
content: Tennessee coach Tony Vitello has been named the new manager of the San Francisco Giants, the team announced Wednesday.

title: Fields shrugs off Jets owner's criticism of his play
content: Jets quarterback Justin Fields shrugged off criticism from team owner Woody Johnson, saying he's not seeking a conversation to clear the air.

title: Payton: No intent to offend Wilson with comment
content: Broncos coach Sean Payton said he didn't mean to criticize Russell Wilson by saying he had told Giants officials that he had hoped to face him instead of Jaxson Dart

title: Source: Brondello set to coach expansion Tempo
content: Sandy Brondello, who has won two WNBA championships as head coach, has agreed to become the first coach of the expansion Toronto Tempo, a source told ESPN.

title: LeBron helps Lakers dissect opening-night loss
content: Coach JJ Redick said LeBron James, who missed the opener because of sciatica, was an important voice as the Lakers sifted through the tape Wednesday.

title: 'Born to do this': Suzuki gets 1-year Angels deal
content: Kurt Suzuki has only a one-year deal to be the new manager of the Angels, but he said he's excited to prove himself and that he was "born to do this."

title: üèà Bolts TE Gadsden benched by father in fantasy
content: Oronde Gadsden II will be starting in many fantasy football lineups this week -- but not in his own father's.

title: The best players who might be available at the NFL trade deadline: Our 1-25 ranking
content: Here's how the top trade candidates -- including Trey Hendrickson, Chris Olave and even Mark Andrews -- stack up. Who is the top target to land before Nov. 4?

title: Bilas' men's basketball 2025 preseason All-America teams
content: From three transfers on the first team to four freshmen on the second, here are Jay Bilas' preseason All-America teams.

title: Conference player of the year picks
content: From teammates to contenders for the No. 1 pick in the 2026 NBA draft, here are the front-runners in each league.

title: Remembering Michigan State-Michigan and the birth of the 'Surrender Cobra' meme 10 years later
content: A stunning finish cemented Michigan State player Jalen Watts-Jackson and Michigan fan Chris Baldwin into college football history.

title: Two Blue Jays in the top 3? Ranking the best players in the 2025 World Series
content: Here's how the Dodgers' and Blue Jays' rosters stack up and who is primed to do the most jaw-dropping things on the sport's biggest stage.

title: UCL talking points: Conte's rant, Liverpool's best XI, who is Cl√°sico-ready?
content: Was Antonio Conte's reaction to Napoli's 6-2 loss justified? What has Liverpool learned from thumping Frankfurt? ESPN's writers take a look at the biggest talking points after Matchday 3 in the UCL.

title: Contender rankings for all 30 NBA teams: Is their time now or later?
content: ESPN analyst Zach Kram analyzes our Now or Later rankings, where the first-place team is the most desperate to win now and the 30th-place franchise is the most content to win later.

title: The NBA season is here! Expert picks for East, West and NBA champs
content: Is OKC destined to repeat? Can anyone in the East mount a challenge? Who wins the MVP? Our experts weigh in.

title: Buzz: Mahomes' return to excellence, Ferguson's rise and why to trade for McMillan
content: What the advanced metrics say about Patrick Mahomes, Jake Ferguson and other notables from the first seven weeks of NFL action.

title: From the Game 1 guy to the six-pitch magician: Your complete guide to the Dodgers' unhittable, ace-filled rotation
content: Snell, Yamamoto, Glasnow and Ohtani have carried L.A. this October. Here's how to appreciate them in the World Series.

title: The U is back ... in the Bottom 10
content: As has become a midseason ritual, Miami suffered a loss it probably shouldn't have and ended up on our list.

title: NFL Week 8 Power Rankings: 1-32 poll, plus unsung role players, nonstarters from every team
content: Let's update our NFL Power Rankings ahead of Week 8. Plus, here are the unsung role players and nonstarters on each roster.

title: NFL replay challenge success rates have skyrocketed. A new camera feed may be why
content: Replay challenge success rates have increased by about half this year, largely fueled by a new camera angle.

title: Why the Mariners are built to be back after a crushing ALCS loss
content: The 2025 season was the closest Seattle has come to the World Series -- and the team believes the best is yet to come.

title: Why Bar√ßa vs. Villarreal in Miami was canceled
content: Less than two weeks after LaLiga said Barcelona would play Villarreal in Miami, the first regular-season game abroad has been scrapped. What happened?

title: Draft guide: All you need to win your league this season
content: We've got everything you need to help you prepare for and execute a successful draft, all in one place.

title: Championship picture, schedule, stats and facts
content: Formula 1 ventures to Mexico City for round 20 of the 2025 season. Find out how the championship shapes up and everything you need to know for the weekend.

title: Transfer rumors, news: Man United, Chelsea, Man City to vie for Elliot Anderson
content: Manchester United have joined Manchester City and Chelsea in the race for Nottingham Forest's Elliot Anderson. Transfer Talk has the latest news and rumors.

title: Ranking the 10 greatest NWSL teams of all time: Who's No. 1?
content: Let's rank the 10 best NWSL teams since the league launched in 2013. How many Portland Thorns, Seattle Reign and Orlando Pride squads make the list?

title: Congress slams Lokpal after anti-corruption body issues tender to purchase 7 BMW cars
content: Congress leader Abhishek Manu Singhvi says it is ironic to see the anti-corruption body ordering BMWs for its members and the guardians of integrity chasing luxury over legitimacy

title: Weather system over Bay of Bengal unlikely to intensify; Heavy rains to persist over north Tamil Nadu this week
content: The northeast monsoon in its vigorous mode pounded most districts across the State. Periyakalapet in Puducherry recorded extremely heavy rainfall of 25 cm in the 24 hours ending 8:30 a.m. on October 22

title: NHRC issues notice to three States over attack on journalists
content: The National Human Rights Commission asked the Director Generals of Police of Kerala, Tripura and Manipur for detailed reports on the matter within two weeks

title: Congress hints at solo BMC poll bid; Bhai Jagtap seeks distance from MVA
content: Party MLC urges independent contest, citing grassroots mobilisation and internal Political Affairs Committee support

title: B. Tech graduate found dead in paying guest house
content: The security guard, with the help of others, shifted Pawan to a near-by hospital where the doctors declared him as brought dead

title: Andhra Pradesh introduces Common Zoning Regulations to streamline urban development
content: They mark the first-ever uniform framework for all Urban Local Bodies and Urban Development Authorities, replacing multiple master plans that have long caused ambiguity and procedural delays ¬†

title: Withdraw new Home Ministry directive on OCI status, says CPI(M) MP John Brittas
content: The August 12, 2025 notification allows for the cancellation of Overseas Citizenship of India status if a cardholder is chargesheeted for an offence carrying a sentence of seven years or more, even without a conviction

title: UKG kid quits classes after bus ride denial; AEO seeks action against HM
content: Kerala State Commission for Protection of Child Rights registers case against ALP School, Chelembra, and begins investigation into denial of entry for five-year-old child on school bus.

title: CM Naidu invites Sharaf Group to invest in A.P.
content: Sharaf Group expresses willingness to invest in logistics and warehouses in A.P., while Transworld Group is keen to partner in setting up shipbuilding unit at Dugarajapatnam

title: Landing of President‚Äôs helicopter  on newly-laid turf triggers row
content: The chopper had originally been scheduled to land at Nilakkal, but unfavourable weather forced a last-minute change. Officials clarified that the helipad had been completed only hours before the President‚Äôs arrival, and its surface had not fully set due to damp weather

title: Great Green Wall to protect Andhra Pradesh‚Äôs coastline from cyclones and environmental degradation
content: An initiative of the Department of Environment, Forests, Science & Technology, the project spanning 5 km will comprise a multi-layered green buffer zone having mangroves, shelterbelt plantations, inland vegetation, and sand dunes that will reduce the impact of cyclones and storm surges, and stabilise shorelines

title: Congress comes down on LDF over move to join PM-SHRI scheme
content: AICC general secretary alleges that CPI(M) is deviating from its professed principles by supporting the PM-SHRI scheme

title: No accurate data on number of migrant workers in State
content: Unified portal and mobile application and Kerala Interstate Migrant Workers Welfare Registration Ordinance still being readied

title: CPI State executive weighs the ‚Äòpros and cons‚Äô of signing up for the NEP-linked PM-SHRI scheme
content: Party feels the LDF government should be wary of rising to the Centre‚Äôs ‚ÄúNEP bait. States that committing to PM-SHRI will implicitly signal adherence to the NEP, which infringes on federalism and, at a stroke, negates cultural, ethnic and linguistic diversities by seeking to centralise school education

title: NIMHANS launches new video series on mental health
content: The series on YouTube features mental health professionals from NIMHANS, offering valuable insights into a range of mental health conditions.

title: Over 130 cracker-related eye injury cases reported in Bengaluru; majority among children
content: Doctors said they are expecting more cases on Wednesday (October 22) night as it is the last day of the festivities.

title: President to  visit Kottayam on Thursday
content: President Droupadi Murmu will be the chief guest of the valedictory ceremony of the platinum jubilee of St. Thomas Autonomous College, Pala

title: Majority of wellness Ayurveda players outside Kerala Tourism‚Äôs classification
content: Only less than 60 players have registered with the department, while over 150 are actively operating in the sector in Kerala without any classification

title: Release ‚Çπ2,700 crore Aarogyasri dues, demands APCC chief Sharmila
content: With the suspension of services by the empanelled hospitals, patients are suffering, the Congress party leader says, and warns of indefinite hunger strike if the government does not do the needful

title: With Karnataka Social and Educational Survey set to resume, all eyes are on its progress in Bengaluru region
content: The survey in Greater Bengaluru Authority region, which started on October 4, has managed to record a progress of about 45.97%

title: A.P. CM Naidu begins UAE tour, pushes for investment in green energy, data centres
content: Sobha Group Chairman Ravi P.N.C. Menon offers ‚Çπ100 crore for the establishment of a world-class library in Amaravati

title: Railway employee avails instant loan, harassed and blackmailed for double the amount
content: The police have advised people to stay away from instant loan apps to avoid harassment and cyber frauds

title: Andhra Pradesh government will clear pending housing bills soon, says Minister Parthasarathy
content: Government identifying causes of dissatisfaction among people in the housing sector and trying to address them, the Minister says

title: Satish Jarkiholi well-suited to provide leadership to politics of liberal, progressive ideology: Yathindra Siddaramaiah
content: ‚ÄòMy father is in the last phase of his political career,‚Äô CM Siddaramaiah‚Äôs son said; clarified that he did not name Satish Jarkiholi as his father‚Äôs successor

title: Kingpin of ‚Çπ300‚Äëcrore multi-State fraud arrested after six months on the run
content: Sri Sathya Sai police apprehend Morimi Shetty Suresh, alias Dal Mill Suri, in Warangal; 57 cases filed across five States, with steps underway to seize his properties.

title: More than 70 persons injured in Vellore and nearby districts while bursting crackers
content: Among the injured, many patients were treated for burns, eye injuries, and minor trauma resulting from firecracker mishaps.

title: IT Minister Lokesh moots Griffith University India Centre in Andhra Pradesh
content: The Minister, during his ongoing tour of Australia, meets top officials of Griffith University, James Cook University, and Populous Architects, and pushes for collaboration in education, aquaculture, and sports infrastructure

title: Traffic restrictions issued for heavy vehicles in Gudiyatham
content: According to a press release, traffic restrictions for heavy vehicles are aimed to facilitate smooth flow of traffic in Gudiyatham town

title: Two tonnes of firecrackers seized from residential area near Walajah
content: In the wake of the death of four persons after a fire broke out at an illegal cracker godown near Avadi, Collector J. U. Chandrakala formed special teams to crack such illegal godowns in the district.

title: Officers issuing content notice to be made more ‚Äòaccountable‚Äô
content: Notices under Rule 3(1)(d) must clarify that the nature of the communication¬†is a warning that safe harbour does not apply to the content being flagged; orders will be passed at Joint Secretary level

title: Telangana abolishes transport check posts to enhance transparency and efficiency
content: The Transport department will now turn to artificial intelligence tools across 63 centres of the department to record who enters and exits offices of the department

title: Inside Arthur Road Jail: Belgian Court shown pictures of barrack where Mehul Choksi may be kept
content: The submission is part of an official affidavit by the Government of India before the Belgian Court, where Mehul Choksi has opposed his extradition, citing alleged threats to his life and concerns about prison conditions in India

title: Palaniswami levelling false allegations on paddy procurement: T.N. Agriculture Minister
content: In the last four-and-a-half years, the DMK government has taken prompt action in matters related to paddy procurement, says M.R.K. Panneerselvam

title: Government to procure six fast patrol boats for armed forces, issues Request for Proposal
content: According to the the Request for Proposal issued, the boat shall also be employed to carry out patrolling and surveillance of conflict zone

title: Thamarassery clash: MP seeks district administration‚Äôs intervention
content: He claims that pollution issues related to the slaughterhouse waste management company have been troubling residents for long

title: Delhi High Court judge Prathiba M. Singh appointed as chair of WIPO‚Äôs advisory board
content: Apart from Justice Singh, the board includes nine other members who will provide guidance and direction to World Intellectual Property Organization‚Äôs work with judiciaries

title: BJP Bengal chief warns party leaders over laxity during proposed SIR drive
content: He reportedly warned that any negligence in implementing the SIR could prove politically disastrous for the party in the run-up to the 2026 assembly polls

title: Karnataka envious of Andhra Pradesh‚Äôs success in attracting investments, says BJP State chief Madhav
content: By roping in some of the world‚Äôs most prominent companies to invest in Andhra Pradesh, the coalition government has proved its capability to transform the State into a preferred destination for global entrepreneurs, he says

title: When the Louvre thieves missed grabbing the diamonds from Golconda
content: While the history of the Kohinoor diamond has a few missing pages, the Pitt Regent has a continuous history from 1701 onwards when it made its appearance in colonial Madras where the Governor was Thomas Pitt

title: Bengaluru police inspector accused of cheating woman
content: The victim said that she met the officer, identified as Sunil H.B., when she went to file a complaint against a person a year and a half ago.

title: Global firms setting up innovation and technology hubs in Telangana: IT Minister
content: Sridhar Babu, who is on an official visit to Australia, met industry representatives as well as presided over the signing of LoI between Telangana government and RMIT University, Melbourne

title: NHRC member reviews investigation into hidden camera case at Apollo University
content: Vijaya Bharathi Sayani visits campus, meets students and officials, and calls for a transparent, time-bound probe into the privacy breach

title: Here are the big stories from Karnataka today
content: Welcome to the Karnataka Today newsletter, your guide from The Hindu on the major news stories to follow today. Curated and written by Nalme Nachiyar.

title: Chittoor district targets 50% green cover by 2047 under Mission Haritha Andhra Pradesh
content: Collector urges coordinated efforts, mass plantation drives, and youth participation to boost district‚Äôs green cover from the current 34%

title: Extradition saga: no reprieve for Mehul Choksi from Belgian court
content: The court reasons that the documents submitted by Mr. Choksi were insufficient to demonstrate that he ran a serious risk of being subjected to denial of justice upon extradition

title: Punjab Police bust cross-border weapons smuggling network, four held
content: Preliminary investigation reveals that the arrested accused were working on the directions of a Pakistan-based smuggler who had been orchestrating cross-border weapons movement into Punjab

title: 'Joint PC? But only one pic': BJP mocks 'Mahagathbandhan' presser; poster shows only Tejashwi
content: The BJP mocked the Mahagathbandhan after a press conference poster featured only RJD leader Tejashwi Yadav, suggesting Rahul Gandhi and Congress were sidelined. The INDIA bloc appeared ready to announce Tejashwi as its chief ministerial candidate, with leaders meeting to resolve alliance stalemates and clear confusion ahead of Bihar Assembly elections.

title: 'Putin wasn't honest': Trump imposes heavy sanctions on Russian oil firms
content: The United States is imposing significant sanctions on Russia's top oil firms, Rosneft and Lukoil, due to President Putin's perceived lack of honest engagement in peace talks with President Trump. This action follows the collapse of ceasefire discussions and the cancellation of a planned Trump-Putin summit, signaling US frustration over the stalled peace negotiations.

title: Midnight blast halts trains in Assam: Track and sleepers destroyed near Kokrajhar
content: A massive blast, suspected to be from an IED, disrupted train services on the Northeast Frontier Railway early Thursday morning. The explosion damaged tracks between Salakati and Kokrajhar, causing an emergency halt to a goods train. While no casualties were reported, eight trains were detained, and security forces are investigating the serious security breach.

title: China‚ÄìEU tech feud: VW, BMW brace for shortages; auto crisis looms
content: iPhone 17 Pro Cosmic Orange models are reportedly turning pink. This discoloration is linked to the porous nature of anodized aluminum, which can absorb chemicals like hydrogen peroxide found in some cleaning products. Apple advises against using such agents, recommending alcohol wipes instead. Owners are urged to handle devices with care to preserve the vibrant finish.

title: IND vs AUS 2nd ODI: Did Kohli just retire at the Adelaide Oval? Image goes viral
content: Virat Kohli endured a difficult return to international cricket, registering his second consecutive duck in the second ODI against Australia at Adelaide Oval. Dismissed by Xavier Bartlett, this marked a career first for the star batter. Despite the recent setbacks, Kohli's impressive past record at the venue remains a notable point.

title: False alarm: IMD red alert fizzles as Chennai sees light rain only; schools remain closed
content: Weather alerts for heavy rain in Tamil Nadu, including Chennai, proved largely inaccurate as a low-pressure system fizzled out. While some areas saw light showers, major warnings were downgraded. Experts cite the dynamic nature of weather systems and interactions between the Bay of Bengal and Arabian Sea for the forecast discrepancies.

title: Gang-raped, threatened: Woman sexually assaulted, robbed by 5 at Bengaluru home
content: A 27-year-old woman from Bengal was allegedly gang-raped and robbed at her Bengaluru residence on Tuesday night. Five individuals reportedly entered her home, sexually assaulted her, and fled with cash and mobile phones. Police have arrested three suspects and are actively searching for the remaining two. The survivor is reported to be out of danger.

title: Volkswagen, BMW, Mercedes and GM raise alarm as Europe vs Chinese chip company Nexperia battle continues
content: New Chinese export restrictions on chips and automotive components, triggered by the Dutch government's intervention in Nexperia, are causing concern for Europe's automotive supply chain. Volkswagen has warned of potential production stoppages due to chip shortages, while BMW and Mercedes-Benz are working to secure supplies amid escalating tech tensions.

title: Gold & silver price prediction: Will rates fall further? Here‚Äôs what you should know
content: Gold and silver price prediction today: Gold and silver prices are experiencing a downturn due to profit-taking after recent rallies. MCX Gold has corrected from ‚Çπ1,31,000 to ‚Çπ1,27,000, with potential further dips to ‚Çπ1,24,000. MCX Silver has fallen below $50 and ‚Çπ1,70,000, targeting ‚Çπ1,42,000. Global factors and Fed cues remain key influencers.

title: New blow: Kohli departs for duck; suffers never-seen-before embarrassment
content: Xavier Bartlett struck a significant blow in the second ODI, dismissing Virat Kohli for a golden duck with a well-executed lbw. This marks the first time in Kohli's illustrious 303-match career that he has been out for consecutive ducks, leaving the Indian contingent in disbelief.

title: Physics in action? Police steps in as IIT Guwahati students engage in rocket-war on Diwali
content: A Diwali celebration at IIT Guwahati devolved into a dangerous 'firecracker war' between students from two hostels. The chaotic scene, with rockets and crackers launched between buildings, necessitated police intervention. The incident, captured in a viral video, saw the campus sky lit up in a manner resembling a battlefield.

title: Reddit sues Perplexity; claims data theft for AI training, case filed in NY
content: Social media giant Reddit has filed a lawsuit against AI startup Perplexity and three data-scraping companies, alleging unlawful scraping of Reddit's data to train Perplexity's AI. Reddit claims these firms circumvented its protections to steal content, despite Perplexity lacking a license.

title: High speed, no helmets, damaged road: Murthal outing turns ugly as 3 friends die in crash
content: A tragic late-night ride ended in the deaths of three friends on the Libaspur flyover after their motorcycle crashed into a barrier. None of the victims were wearing helmets, highlighting a persistent disregard for road safety despite increased enforcement and awareness campaigns.  Excuses for not wearing helmets are common, even as fatalities rise.

title: 'Too poor to buy crackers': Punjab family makes bomb at home; explosion kills 1
content: During the lively Bandi Chhor Divas festivities in Dharmabad village, Gurdaspur, a heart-wrenching event transpired as a homemade explosive detonated, tragically taking one life and injuring six others. The device, reportedly constructed from an iron pipe and potash by brothers struggling with financial difficulties, went off unexpectedly during its ignition.

title: US Congress‚Äô H-1B wish-list to Trump and what they mean for Indian talent
content: Seven US lawmakers have urged President Trump to withdraw the proposed $100,000 H-1B visa fee and introduce reforms promoting fairer, more efficient immigration. Their proposals include stronger oversight of outsourcing firms, easier visa portability, updated wage tiers, and a balanced fee system ‚Äî measures that could reshape opportunities for Indian professionals and boost America‚Äôs innovation economy.

title: ‚ÄòLook at our neighbours‚Ä¶‚Äô: Ex-cricketer slams Cong spokesperson's remark on Sarfaraz Khan
content: Former cricketer Atul Wassan slammed Congress spokesperson Shama Mohamed's suggestion that Sarfaraz Khan's exclusion from India A squads was due to his religion. Wassan expressed shame over communal narratives entering cricket, emphasizing meritocracy and India's inclusive history in the sport. He stressed that selection debates are cricketing matters, not communal ones.

title: Delhi encounter: 4 Bihar-based criminals gunned down in joint police op
content: Four men wanted in Bihar for murder and other serious offenses were killed in an early morning encounter with Delhi Police and Bihar Police. The suspects allegedly opened fire when intercepted, leading to retaliatory action. At least two to three officers were injured during the operation.

title: Understanding LDL & HDL cholesterol and natural ways to protect your heart
content: Cholesterol, vital for cell health and hormone production, requires a delicate balance between LDL and HDL. High LDL clogs arteries, increasing heart risks, while HDL acts as a scavenger.  Simple lifestyle changes like fibre-rich meals, healthy fats, nuts, fruits, vegetables, and regular exercise can naturally manage cholesterol levels, safeguarding your heart health.

title: Delhi air pollution 2025: Doctors share who is most at risk and how to protect lungs
content: Delhi's air quality has plummeted, causing widespread respiratory distress and exacerbating existing health conditions. Vulnerable groups, including children, the elderly, and those with chronic illnesses, face heightened risks. Experts urge immediate preventive measures like staying indoors, wearing masks, and maintaining clean indoor air to mitigate the severe health impacts of the smog.

title: Stephen and Ayesha Curry divorce rumours denied after viral podcast remarks
content: Recent rumors of a Stephen and Ayesha Curry divorce were fueled by Ayesha's "Call Her Daddy" podcast comments about not wanting marriage or children. However, no evidence supports these claims, as their social media shows continued affection and family photos. Steph recently posted a tribute to Ayesha, calling her his 'rock'.

title: Knicks vs Cavaliers injury update: Hart, Robinson out; Towns uncertain
content: The NBA season kicks off with the New York Knicks hosting the Cleveland Cavaliers on October 22, 2025. Both teams face significant injury concerns, with the Knicks missing key players like Mitchell Robinson and Karl-Anthony Towns. The Cavaliers will also be without Darius Garland. Despite roster challenges, both sides aim for a strong opening performance at Madison Square Garden.

title: Daniel Naroditsky net worth 2025: Chess grandmaster‚Äôs income, death & legacy
content: Chess world mourns Daniel Naroditsky, a beloved American grandmaster and online teacher. Naroditsky, known for his clear lessons, died at 29. His estimated net worth in 2025 was one million dollars. He inspired countless players globally through YouTube, Twitch, and coaching. His passing leaves a void in the chess community, remembered for making the game accessible and enjoyable for all.

title: Stock market today: Nifty50 crosses 26,000; BSE Sensex up over 500 points
content: Stock market today: Nifty50 and BSE Sensex, the Indian equity benchmark indices, soared in opening trade on Thursday. While Nifty50 went above 26,000, BSE Sensex was up over 500 points.

title: Two decades of declining education degrees: Is America running out of teachers?
content: A new AACTE analysis reveals a two-decade decline in US education degrees, signalling a shrinking teacher pipeline. Bachelor‚Äôs and master‚Äôs awards have dropped sharply, while enrolments in traditional programmes continue to fall. Alternative certification routes, however, are growing, alongside greater diversity among graduates. Experts warn that inadequate investment in teacher preparation could worsen America‚Äôs teacher shortage.

title: 'Down to nothing by year end': Trump's another crude claim on India's Russian oil imports
content: US President claims India will significantly reduce its Russian oil purchases by year-end, stating it's a gradual process. He also discussed China's relationship with Russia, suggesting it was forced by the previous administration and expressing hope for dialogue on ending the war in Ukraine.

title: 'He‚Äôs out of rhythm' ‚Äì Ex-India cricketer delivers harsh verdict on Virat Kohli
content: Virat Kohli's familiar struggle with deliveries outside off stump resurfaced in the first ODI against Australia, leading to a duck. Former player Mohammad Kaif attributes this to a lack of match practice, impacting Kohli's rhythm and anticipation. Despite this setback, Kohli aims to find form at Adelaide Oval, a venue where he has a strong record.

title: Bhai Dooj 2025: Top 50 wishes, messages and quotes to share with your loved ones
content: Bhai Dooj, celebrated two days after Diwali, honors the strong bond between brothers and sisters. This year, it falls on October 22, with sisters praying for their brothers' well-being and brothers pledging protection. The festival is a time for joy, gifts, and cherishing lifelong connections, even across distances.

title: Saudi Arabia appoints Sheikh Saleh bin Fawzan bin Abdullah Al-Fawzan as new Grand Mufti
content: Saudi Arabia, by royal decree issued by King Salman, has announced Sheikh Saleh bin Fawzan bin Abdullah Al-Fawzan as the new Grand Mufti. He succeeds the late Sheikh Abdulaziz Al-Sheikh and will serve as chairman of the Council of Senior Scholars and head of the Permanent Committee for Scholarly Research and Ifta, holding the rank of minister.

title: IND vs AUS: Rohit ‚Äòdeliberately underperforming‚Äô under Gill? India legend fires back
content: India's openers struggled in their first ODI against Australia, with Rohit Sharma scoring eight and Virat Kohli a duck. Speculation arose on social media about deliberate underperformance to challenge new captain Shubman Gill. However, Sunil Gavaskar dismissed these theories, emphasizing that players wouldn't risk their careers and highlighting the benefit of experienced leaders for Gill.

title: Flying with a power bank? New rules could ground your gadget
content: India is considering stricter rules for power banks on flights after a recent incident on an IndiGo flight. The Directorate General of Civil Aviation is reviewing technical inputs as foreign airlines like Emirates and Singapore Airlines have already implemented restrictions on power bank usage and charging onboard.

title: UP: BJP neta makes trader rub nose on road over parking row; arrested
content: A BJP office bearer in Meerut was arrested and removed from his post after forcing a businessman to publicly apologize by rubbing his nose on the road. The incident, captured on video, occurred outside a UP minister's office. Three police personnel present at the scene were also shunted for inaction.

title: Aaron Rodgers reacts hilariously after Steelers player tackles him mid-celebration
content: Steelers' Broderick Jones accidentally tackled Aaron Rodgers during a touchdown celebration, leading to a humorous exchange. Rodgers, unfazed, playfully warned his teammate about future collisions. Jones, embracing the moment, vowed to bring similar energy. This incident highlights the developing camaraderie within the team, even as Rodgers proves his enduring skill on the field.

title: 'Blot on humanity': Ill Dalit man made to lick urine after soiling temple stairs in UP
content: A 65-year-old Dalit man, suffering from illness, was allegedly forced to lick his own urine and clean temple stairs in Lucknow after an accident. The jewellery shop owner, Swami Kant, was arrested following a complaint. The incident has sparked outrage and calls for stringent action against caste-based humiliation.

title: Bihar polls: Tejashwi oppn's CM face? Answers at presser today, say INDIA allies
content: Tejashwi Yadav's declaration as the INDIA bloc's CM face in Bihar is imminent following crucial meetings between Congress leaders and RJD's Lalu Prasad. Allies express confidence in Tejashwi's leadership, with an official announcement expected soon. Congress assures unity and a strong electoral front for Bihar.

title: Choksi extradition: Swish prison cell awaits bizman ‚Äî Inside Mumbai‚Äôs Arthur Road jail
content: Fugitive Mehul Choksi's extradition to India will see him housed in a specially prepared cell at Arthur Road jail, designed to meet European prisoner standards.  Photographs reveal a surprisingly well-equipped dwelling with ample light, ventilation, and amenities, countering claims of poor jail conditions. This development follows a Belgian court's decision to uphold his extradition.

title: 'If you want trophy': New twist in Asia Cup row; Naqvi sends stern message to BCCI
content: A dispute has erupted between the BCCI and PCB over the Asia Cup trophy presentation. PCB chairman Mohsin Naqvi insists on personally handing the trophy to India in Dubai on November 10, following India's refusal to accept it from him after their win. This stems from tensions between the Indian team and the ACC president.

title: Staggered pan-India SIR likely in a week, 3 months for each phase
content: A nationwide special intensive revision of electoral rolls is set to begin within days, mirroring Bihar's successful three-month process. This significant undertaking, the first in over two decades, aims to update voter lists across India. States facing immediate assembly polls will be prioritized, with a final roll expected by early next year.

title: 'Insult to Hindus': BJP after Kali idol 'desecrated' in Bengal; taken away in prison van
content: Desecration of a Goddess Kali idol in West Bengal's South 24 Parganas district sparked outrage, with the BJP accusing the TMC government of shielding culprits. Police are investigating the damaged idol, found in a village temple, and warned against misinformation. The incident occurred amidst protests and stone-pelting, leading to police intervention.

title: "Indian Died": Hyderabad Man, In Video, Says Don't Want To Fight For Russia
content: Mohammed Ahmed travelled to Russia from Telangana in April, hoping to find employment in the construction sector.

title: Meta To Cut 600 Jobs In AI Division To Streamline Operations
content: Facebook owner Meta is cutting 600 jobs in its artificial intelligence division in a move intended to streamline operations after an aggressive hiring spree, US media reported Wednesday.

title: North Korea Tests New Weapon System A Week Ahead Of APEC Summit
content: North Korea said on Thursday it had tested a "cutting-edge" new weapon system using hypersonic missiles aimed at bolstering its defences against Pyongyang's foes.

title: BJP Trying To Impose Their Preferred Officer As Top Cop In Tamil Nadu: DMK
content: The ruling DMK government has accused the BJP-led Union Government of attempting to impose its preferred officer as the next Director General of Police in Tamil Nadu.

title: Indian-Origin Historian Sunil Amrith Wins British Academy Book Prize
content: 'The Burning Earth: An Environmental History of the Last 500 Years' by Indian-origin historian Sunil Amrith has been named the winner of this year's British Academy Book Prize, a prestigious 25,000-pound award that celebrates the world's best works o

title: Elaborate Arrangements At Bihar Stations To Handle Chhath Rush: Railways
content: Elaborate arrangements have been made in all stations in the Hajipur-headquartered East Central Railway (ECR) zone in view of the heavy rush of passengers during Chhath Puja, a senior official said.

title: IAS Officer vs Minister Over Liquor Hologram Tender In Telangana
content: Senior IAS officer Syed Ali Murtaza Rizvi, serving as Revenue Secretary (Commercial Taxes and Excise) in Telangana, has opted for voluntary retirement (VRS) with eight years remaining service.

title: Family Of Last UK Woman Executed In 1955 Calls For Her To Be Pardoned
content: The grandchildren of the last woman to be executed in Britain have called for Ruth Ellis to be pardoned, 70 years after she was sent to the gallows for murdering her "abusive" lover, their lawyers said Wednesday.

title: From Trafficking To Miscarriage: 5 Takeaways From Epstein Victim's Memoir
content: "Nobody's Girl", the memoir by Virginia Giuffre, sex convict Jeffrey Epstein's lead accuser who died by suicide in April, topped Amazon's bestseller lists on Wednesday, a day after going on sale.

title: Delhi-NCR Air Quality Remains "Very Poor", Overall AQI At 362
content: The Air Quality Index (AQI) in Delhi and its National Capital Region on Thursday morning remained under the "very poor" category with the Graded Response Action Plan (GRAP) II norms already in place.

title: 4 Most-Wanted Gangsters From 'Sigma Gang' Killed In Delhi Encounter
content: Four most wanted gangsters from Bihar were killed in a police encounter in Delhi early Thursday. They were wanted criminals in several heinous cases in Bihar.

title: Cow Vigilante Allegedly Shot In Hyderabad, BJP Leaders Condemn Attack
content: A cow vigilante, Sonu, was allegedly shot by a cow smuggling mafia in the Ghatkesar area of Hyderabad on Wednesday.

title: Temple Ex-Official Detained As Probe Continues In Sabarimala Gold Theft Case
content: The former administrative officer of the Sabarimala temple was detained by the Special Investigation Team (SIT) in connection with the misappropriation of gold plating from Lord Ayyappa's sacred shrine.

title: "It's A Process": Trump Reiterates Claim On India's Russian Oil Imports Amid New Sanctions
content: US President Donald Trump has reiterated his claim that New Delhi has assured him that India will curb its Russian oil imports, citing a personal assurance from Prime Minister Narendra Modi.

title: "President Is Disappointed": US Sanctions Russia's 2 Largest Oil Firms
content: US Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent announced new sanctions Wednesday against Russia's two biggest oil companies and blasted Moscow's refusal to end its "senseless war."

title: SC/ST Act Can't Be Used To Curtail Bank's Mortgage Rights: Delhi Court
content: The Delhi High Court has said that the provisions of the SC/ST Act relating to wrongful occupation or dispossession of land belonging to people from SC and ST cannot be used to prevent a bank from exercising its lawful mortgage rights.

title: UP Man Kills Wife Over Alleged Affair, Burries Body Inside House; Arrested
content: A 48-year-old man who allegedly killed his wife over an illicit relationship and buried her body inside their house in Uttar Pradesh's Bahraich district has been arrested, police said on Wednesday.

title: Trinamool To Launch Anti-SIR Campaign In West Bengal
content: Trinamool Congress (TMC) is planning to hold a massive rally in Kolkata against the proposed Special Intensive Revision (SIR) of electoral rolls in West Bengal.

title: We Failed: Louvre Director Admits Inadequate Camera Surveillance After Heist
content: The director of the Louvre on Wednesday admitted to inadequate camera surveillance of the museum's outside walls, three days after thieves robbed it of prize jewels in a brazen daytime heist.

title: Trump To Meet China's Xi In South Korea, Cancels Meeting With Russia's Putin
content: United States President Donald Trump on Wednesday (local time) announced his upcoming diplomatic trip to Malaysia, South Korea, and Japan, highlighting a significant meeting with Chinese President Xi Jinping in South Korea.

title: Tullis-Joyce's rise to USWNT, Man United No. 1 (via a rainforest)
content: the summer break offers the opportunity to jet off to glitzy locations like Ibiza or Dubai . the 29-year-old goalkeeper is a real fan favorite at the club . she has been working with a researcher called Dr. Rosa V√°squez Espinoza .

title: Ranking every open Power 4 job in college football
content: all four power conferences have had a firing in the first half of the season . no coach is safe, but a strong line of storms has been forecasted . a total of 298-150 coaches have been fired from the power conference .

title: What we're hearing on the WNBA's CBA negotiations
content: a year ago, the WNBA players' association announced the players would opt out of their current collective bargaining agreement with the league that was set to expire following the 2025 season . the players outlined their desire for a new economic model based on equity . there are no signs a deal will be put in place by the date that the current deal expires, on Oct. 31 .

title: Ranking the 6 UFC championship fights still to come in 2025
content: Tom Aspinall will defend his undisputed heavyweight title against former interim titleholder Ciryl Gane . Virna Jandiroba will meet Mackenzie Dern for the 115-pound title that Zhang Weili vacated earlier this year to move up to flyweight . the co-main event also finds Zhang trying to become a flyweight champion .

title: CFP Bubble Watch: Who's in, who's out, who has work to do after Week 8
content: a team with Would be in status is featured in this week's top-12 projection . teams with Work to do are the true bubble teams and the first ones outside the bracket . one team with work to do is passing the eye test and has a chance at winning its conference .

title: Coaching tracker for 2026: Toronto Tempo hire Sandy Brondello
content: the expansion Toronto Tempo and Portland Fire join the WNBA next year . the franchise will have an international coach to launch the team . Brondello is a native of australia who has two decades of coaching experience in the league . she has been a head coach for 13 seasons and an assistant for eight seasons .

title: The chaos of the U.S. Open Cup: Why Sharktopus gets a rematch
content: 'Futbol Americas' team debate who's the leading contenders to win the MLS cup . the team looked a little too friendly with the referee during the second round match . a video of him playing for Bellevue's reserve team, B2 was found on his Instagram page .

title: Which NHL teams have the most to prove in 2025-26? Placing 13 teams into tiers
content: few teams in NHL history have proved themselves in the face of doubters more than the Florida Panthers of the past few seasons . this season will be defined by the teams outside of South Florida that need to do a lot of proving of their own .

title: Matchup rankings: Upgrade Bo Nix, downgrade Quinshon Judkins
content: the matchup rankings provide a schedule-independent method to evaluate positional matchups each week . we calibrate points-allowed data to show how each defense fared relative to the difficulty of the schedule it has faced . title: Isak's exit leaves room for Ekitike to be Liverpool's main man
content: arne slot's side ended their losing streak with a 5-1 victory in the champions league . the win answered most of the questions being asked of the premier league champions . but the downside of the performance at Deutsche Bank Park was the 45-minute no-show of Alexander Isak .

title: Where Dodgers-Blue Jays ranks among best World Series matchups since 2000
content: Los Angeles Dodgers and the Toronto Blue Jays will have an epic World Series . none of the past five World Series went longer than six games . the blue Jays are hoping to become the first repeat champion in 25 years .

title: Army transforming its 382 infantry battalions with new weapons & drone platoons
content: the army is now progressively transforming its 382 infantry battalions to meet the myriad challenges of tech-driven warfare . focus is on lethality, mobility, battlefield transparency, situational awareness, survivability, training and restructuring . the infantry is by far the largest arm of the 11.5 lat.

title: From braying to bye-ing: MP loses 94% of donkeys in 3 decades; now just 3,000 left
content: the state now has just 3,052 donkeys, a sharp fall from 49,289 in 1997 . nine of the 55 districts have reported zero donkey, signalling near-total disappearance of the animal that once powered rural India‚Äôs transport and trade . animal rights activist Naresh Kadyan had urged the Centre to declare donkey hide an endangered species .

title: H-1B visa: US lawmakers urge Trump to scrap $100K fee; flag 3 big risks
content: Lubna Kably is a senior editor, who focuses on various policies and legislation. In particular, she writes extensively on immigration and tax policies. The Indian diaspora is the largest in the world; through her articles she demystifies the immigration-policy related developments in select countries for outbound students, job aspirants and employees. She also analyses the impact of Income-tax and GST related developments for individuals and business entities. Read More
